sqldiff.help:
USE: The diffs are ordered by data model version number. The script can be run in a top down fashion and is expected to not fail or overwrite old data
EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: Md. Khaiurl Islam
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cs_doc_profile` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `doctor_name` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `designation` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `course` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `session` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `created_date` DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, `user_id` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `fk_cs_doc_profile_user_id` (`user_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_cs_doc_profile_user_id` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`user_id`) ) ENGINE=INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: Md. Khaiurl Islam
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cs_select_patient` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `patient_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `address` VARCHAR(400) DEFAULT NULL, `father_name` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL, `diagnosis` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `icd_10_code` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `name_of_presenter` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL, `presentation_date` DATE DEFAULT NULL, `admitted_ward` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `admitted_bed` VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT NULL, `unit` VARCHAR(200) DEFAULT NULL, `created_date` DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, `user_id` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `fk_cs_select_patient_user_id` (`user_id`), KEY `fk_cs_select_patient_patient_id` (`patient_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_cs_select_patient_user_id` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`user_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_cs_select_patient_patient_id` FOREIGN KEY (`patient_id`) REFERENCES `patient` (`patient_id`) ) ENGINE=INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: Md. Khaiurl Islam
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cs_sailent_feat` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `sailent_feature` VARCHAR(500) DEFAULT NULL, `select_patient_id` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `created_date` DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, `creator` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `fk_cs_sailent_feature_selectpatient_id` (`select_patient_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_cs_sailent_feature_selectpatient_id` FOREIGN KEY (`select_patient_id`) REFERENCES `cs_select_patient` (`id`) ) ENGINE=INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: Md. Khaiurl Islam
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cs_ot_note` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `select_patient_id` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `date` DATE DEFAULT NULL, `time` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL, `name_of_ot` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL, `procedure_detail` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL, `created_date` DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, `creator` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `fk_cs_ot_note_selectpatient_id` (`select_patient_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_cs_ot_note_selectpatient_id` FOREIGN KEY (`select_patient_id`) REFERENCES `cs_select_patient` (`id`) ) ENGINE=INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: Md. Khaiurl Islam
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cs_slide` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `select_patient_id` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `diagnosis` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL, `plan` VARCHAR(400) DEFAULT NULL, `created_date` DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, `creator` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `fk_cs_slide_selectpatient_id` (`select_patient_id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_cs_slide_selectpatient_id` FOREIGN KEY (`select_patient_id`) REFERENCES `cs_select_patient` (`id`) ) ENGINE=INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
